creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: date seal: 子弎 {ne san} (Rat 3); censor seals: 渡邊 {Watanabe}, 米良 {Mera}, シタ賣{shitauri}; publisher's seal: 庄、両国、廣小路林庄板 {Shō, Ryōgoku, Hirokōji, Hayashishō han}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Imoseyama onna teikin 妹背山婦女庭訓, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1852, 2nd intercalary month.
title: Actors Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as Eboshiori Motome (R) and Iwai Kumesaburō III as Princess Tachibana (L)
